page.title: 15Religion
page.content: There are quite a few religious groups in Chesham,like the Church of England,Catholic and Baptist.Lots of the people in our area,mostly in Sunnyside Road,are Asians and they worship in a mosque,in Bellingdon Road. Most of the 34 people in our class go to St.Mary's Parish Church.Apart from St.Mary's there is a Roman Catholic Church,the Broadway Baptist and other types of churches.Three people in our form go to the Broadway Baptist,one person goes to Chesham Methodist and eight people go to St.Mary's.Fifteen people in our form don't go to church. There are nine churches in our area, they are St.Mary's,Chesham Methodist, Broadway Baptist,Chartridge Chapel, Cemetry Chapel,Hivings Park Free Church,St.Andrew's Fellowship,Great Hundridge,Zion Hall.
